known_issues: Regression: latest deployed version not opening/working for user; suspected cause is app/project name/package identifier changed vs V14 or earlier.

existing_features.title: Restore the appâ€™s visible name/branding everywhere it appears so it matches the naming used in Version 14 (or lower), and ensure the name is consistent across the app shell and UI. This includes at minimum the HTML document title and metadata, the boot fallback screen title text, and the in-app header/footer branding.

Audit and revert any name-derived identifiers that can break loading when renamed (e.g., build identifier strings, hostname/app identifier derivations used in links, or other name-coupled values referenced at startup), restoring them to the Version 14 (or lower) values so the deployed app loads successfully.

projectName: Restore app name/identifier to match Version 14 (or lower) naming
